Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
tax benefitfrom exercisesof stock optionsand vestingof stock units
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Repayment of Debt: payment for debt extinguishment and debt issuance costs
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments for repurchase of common stock excise tax
payments for repurchase of other equity

Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from sale of property held for sale
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: increase decrease in available for sale securities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued taxes payable
increase decrease in operating lease right of use assets
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other current liabilities
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets and liabilities net
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of property plant equipment
gains losses on extinguishment of debt

__unmapped__: increase decrease in restricted cash and investments
